website_summaries.verdict: The convenience and durability of this professional-grade product makes it suitable for pros and novices.
pros: Electric motor makes height easily adjustable from 21.5 to 41.3 inches
Carefully constructed to prevent wobbling and tipping
Includes adjustable grooming arm with leash
cons: Not built with roller wheels, but a few customers chose to add the wheels themselves

customer_reviews.title: Affordability and quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased "used-like new" from the Amazon Warehouse and it came brand new with no issues. The shipping box was damaged but there were no issues with the table. They even sent extra parts (extra grooming loop and bolts). The electric lift is smooth and quiet. It does not disturb the dogs when I raise them up or down. I love my table so much and I am thrilled with the purchase! I am a professional groomer and this is my first electric table. I wanted to stay under $400 for my first electric table, but also didn't want to sacrifice quality. I am very pleased with the quality, noise level, adjustable height, and price!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not just for the professionals ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like it and would recommend. Saves my back from grooming my Sheltie on the floor. Would like to give a 4.5. Only issue is wish it went down farther because as my dog ages he can not jump as high to get on the table and as I age can not pick my dog up. Mickey does not mind the rising and lowering at all, and is very comfortable on the table top. I do use a soft bed when just brushing and some trimming, then remove it and have him stand for the rest. I will always have a canine companion in my life, and this will help make it better for both of us.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Making it easy
customer_reviews.text: We had two standard poodles and it was taking almost 4 hours to groom them sitting on the garage floor, which killed my wife and my backs. This is the deal, we lower it and have the dog jump up on it, then we lift her up to the height we need and it has made grooming the dogs so much easier, faster and better on the back. We thought at first a little expensive, but now having it, worth the money. It is well made and would be considered commercial grade to me.
customer_reviews.author: telam

customer_reviews.title: Very, very nice table
customer_reviews.text: Wow ! What a nice table. Was delivered yesterday by UPS. Was doubled boxed with very heavy cardboard with half inch pressboard (plywood) sandwiched in between. Table arrived in perfect condition. I went to Lowes and purchased four 2 inch threaded screw type locking casters which fit the legs perfectly. Table is so easy to move around now. Table is very, very well made from top to bottom. Motor runs very smooth with no jerky motion going up or down. And very quiet also. The table top corners are semi rounded so you don,t get hip bruises on yourself while grooming. Bolts are all stainless steel . Arm is a nice addition. All in all a ten star table
customer_reviews.author: Shadykennl

customer_reviews.title: we are very happy with our electric table
customer_reviews.text: we are very happy with our electric table. works great, arrived on time. there was couple of screws missing but no big deal we just got some and put them in. very nice table for the price and very happy with it. if I needed another I would get this one.
customer_reviews.author: betty gaines

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table! Its adjustable height is near perfect. I have groomed 2 Golden Doodles and an Airedale.. all 3 dogs over 60 pounds and it handles them well! I wish the table was a tad longer just because the bar isn’t very long and some dogs think they can hang out towards the edge. So I may replace the bar but that is my only little complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Demi C

customer_reviews.title: Great, so glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: Great, so glad I bought this . I have 3 Golden Retrievers and it is perfect for them. They all weight about 65-70 lbs. It does become a little less stable at the hightest point but that could be because I have it on a deck outside. Love it and my back loves it. Very easy to put together and the shipping was fantastic. Well protected ! Highly Recommend !!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia F. Branaugh

customer_reviews.title: Great table, grooming arm not so much!
customer_reviews.text: Love the table and haven't had an issue with moving without wheels. The grooming arm is cheap and not very sturdy. My 18 month old Afghan already pulled and bent it. I had to order a heavier, longer mount on arm.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Grooming Table
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome grooming table! The packaging was pretty damaged when I received it, but it was so well packed and protected inside that the table was undamaged. This table works like a dream! Raises and lowers quietly. The only reason I don't give 5 stars is there is a little room for improvement. If it had locking caster wheels and was just a few inches bigger it would be perfect. I have an 89# labradoodle and he takes up the entire length of the table with just a few inches to spare and would like the option to purchase a slightly larger model of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rose C.

customer_reviews.title: It is a great table. The only problem is that the size ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a great table. The only problem is that the size I ordered is not big enough for large dogs. It's a great table, I would have given it a 5, but I gave it a 4 because it wobbles a little bit when it's high. More for larger dogs than the smaller one. Other than that, it deserves a 5. I love the height control.
customer_reviews.author: ZILDGHIAN JARQUIN

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit - Great back saver
customer_reviews.text: I put some locking, heavy duty castors on the unit so I can move the table as needed. The castors work well. Of course this raises the unit by another 4 inches. At the lowest level, the table top is too high for a couple of my senior dogs to jump up and I can't lift 3 of my dogs so I use a doggie ramp and my dogs walk up and down the ramp to and from the table top. It would be nice to be able to attach the ramp to the unit so the ramp doesn't move, I will work something out for this. A built in ramp would be a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: JRB12

customer_reviews.title: Good Product but watch the Size
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the size, at all. I read the reviews, this is not large enough for a golden retriever. I had a 6 month old golden doodle fall off the side several times. Unfortunately I disposed of the packaging upon arrival. I am going to see if I can return and order a larger size, if they offer one. The product itself was fine, well package. It did come in a few days late but that is to be expected with COVID19 and the closures currently going on. Good product, just check your sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Tilley

customer_reviews.title: Groomer approved
customer_reviews.text: First order i recieved was damaged af contacted about a replacement as soon as i opened it. They quickly sent another and picked up the damaged table for free. We groom all size dogs and this has been durable and so much easier to groom on. Electric pedals and being able to choose where the grooming arm goes helps as well. Easy to assemble and use! Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Lea Rose

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth movement up and down.
customer_reviews.text: So far does what it is suppose to do, Came very well packaged. Very easy to set up and use. Both dogs, 52 pounds, and 40 pounds jumped up, and did not have any issues with staying on the table. Very smooth movements up and down. Not impressed with the overhead arm, does not adjust to a very tall height. . Will be looking to purchase a new arm. Overall very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for the money
customer_reviews.text: After researching and comparing tables to find just the right one for my new endeavor, I settled on the Go Pet Club Grooming Table with an electric motor. Very, very happy with my choice. It's quiet, stable and looks professional. The arm that came with the unit is not strong and makes enough noise to make the dogs nervous so I will replace that ASAP. As everyone stated, the box IS heavy and in shambles by the time it reached my doorstep. But the product itself is perfect - great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Minjares

customer_reviews.title: Good product so far at day 2
customer_reviews.text: Everything is as it should be. Good product no assembly required. I did have to put the little chrome loop for leashes on but that wasnt nothing. The way they shipped it was great. It came in a wooden particle board box inside of a cardboard box.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: It happened to be very nice so I ordered their electric version
customer_reviews.text: I’m a professional pet groomer, I needed an electric grooming table and after finding the table I currently owned had jumped $200 in price, I checked out Amazon, due to a new hire that told me that’s where she got her table. It happened to be very nice so I ordered their electric version. It is very nice quality. I’m so happy I found an affordable place to buy grooming equipment. This table will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stable. I haven't reached out to the seller yet for full disclosure. But the bracket split..
customer_reviews.text: I like the hydraulic system,very smooth. Hate the arm. Everything about it. The location and the way it is made. Very unstable and wonky. I question if I am missing something. The bracket is already splitting after about 3 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: 1motorpsycho

customer_reviews.title: VERY Nice
customer_reviews.text: When I got it, it wouldn't work so I called the company directly and they were willing to send me a new pedal and new motor. I asked if I could fiddle with it and open it up to see if it was a simple fix as I didn't want to void any warrenty and it was, but was nice they were willing to send me new parts if needed. Very smooth operation
customer_reviews.author: Lori Newcomer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful table!
customer_reviews.text: I'll get right to the point. Wonderful table! I do toy breeds but definitely see this table as a must for much larger dogs as well! However, the grooming arm is an absolute piece of junk so be prepared to factor a new arm into the price b/c you'll be buying one for sure. It's horribly wobbly & unstable--no way around it--& again I do TOY breeds! Also go ahead & buy some grooming loops b/c these will be going in the trash--good for nothing. But back to the table--love it! Very stable--I've had several neck surgeries & a bad back & the table is a God-send!
customer_reviews.author: M. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Quality table at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This table is a little smaller than I wanted but it works great and is very sturdy. We groom our small dogs on this table and while it can fit the larger dogs, I prefer a larger table. Anything under 50 pounds and they should have plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: swtchgr

customer_reviews.title: Just one complaint
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grooming table! I use it many times a week, since I groom dogs on the side. My only complain is that after a while the screws get lose on the part that holds the grooming arm, which makes it wobbly. It's nothing you can't fix, I just have to tighten them back up.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Warrick

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a SOLID table for the serious pet groomer. It is very stable, and rises and lowers slowly. Animals will not be frightened by its quiet, smooth operation. This is a great example of getting what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: David T. Twining

customer_reviews.title: Great table, makes grooming my Irish Terrier so much ...
customer_reviews.text: Great table, makes grooming my Irish Terrier so much easier. I hand strip her so it can take several hours over 2 days. I try to let her get comfortable so sometimes she will lay down. Now instead of ending up with a aching back I just move the table higher so I don't have to lean over her.
customer_reviews.author: J Wac

customer_reviews.title: Over all a great product and value however it came with the top ...
customer_reviews.text: Over all a great product and value however it came with the top slanted or not level and I have not figured how to correct it without breaking welds and leveling it and rewelding the braces! Would be a major pain and costly to pack it up and return to manufacturer! Not a lot of choices!
customer_reviews.author: Kent Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful table!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this table for over a year and have had no issues at all. It’s very sturdy and I am able to put pretty large dogs on it. It is sort of heavy so if you are doing house calls like I was, you may need some help moving it around. The only complaint I have it that the arm is sometimes a little wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Malkowski

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great for the money.I bought 4- 2 inch screw in wheels before it arrived.I screwed them in and works perfect.It goes up pretty high.It can also handle large dogs with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: James Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: The table is great. I added locking casters to it and it ...
customer_reviews.text: The table is great. I added locking casters to it and it is perfect for storing. The hollow aluminum arm is very disappointing; the dogs bend it with no problem, it's not safe to use. I don't use it.
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Shakes with large dogs on it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s too small for big dogs! Shakes around and scares the dogs! We had to put a cement block on it To keep it in place so now we can’t put it all the way down! We have a dog that weighs 120 pounds and can’t go up there because it’s too small size wise as well as the moving around!
customer_reviews.author: cynthia ogan canary

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, basically comes assembled already. Wonderful table and a good price. I’m just sorry I waited 30 years to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Trigger

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: has been a wonderful purchase. the first one arrived damaged by UPS but Amazon replaced it and the new one is absolutely wonderful! Makes bathing the dogs so much easier
customer_reviews.author: Peacebear

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and sturdy with great range of motion
customer_reviews.text: Smooth and easy to operate. It goes down very low and can go high enough for a 6' person to comfortably groom. Appears to be very solid and we'll made - does not shake at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sm

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional groomer. This table is really nice but it does have some bad features. The table only stops at knee height so getting older or injured dogs onto the table can be tough. Also pretty wobbly when a dog starts moving or shaking on the table. Other then that is perfect for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged on  three different corners of the table
customer_reviews.text: Hello, The electric grooming table arrived today. As I opened the very damaged box i was already concerned. The table Works nice BUT, came with 3 different damages. One of the smash is very small but 2 is significant. There’s a little cut on the aluminum, can be dangerous for the groomer and the dog. Anyhow, I would love a replacement. I would rather but back in the box and send it back for an replacement. I hope the photos shows what I explained. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: reynaldo henrique barbosa vieira

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this table
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this table! It’s sturdy and smooth none of the dogs I’ve groomed so far are scared by its movement. I am really happy to have purchased this table. I hope it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Bizypawz

customer_reviews.title: This is a good table for the most part
customer_reviews.text: I'm just getting started out grooming. This is a good table for the most part. I wish it would come down a little lower as some dogs are hesitant to jump up on it. Also not as stable as I would like due to narrower base. Arm that comes with table is very poor quality. Immediately ordered a heavy duty arm. This is a great table for small and med sized dogs. Not so good for large dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy!! Love this table! Was an amazing deal and I would buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Chills

customer_reviews.title: Table stop rising up on day 36!  Only 6 days after the seller warranty!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer be aware this seller only offer 30 days warranty. My table stop rising up on day number 36. They advise me to contact the manufacturer to claim any warranty. The seller issue me their number. I will be updating this review as soon I hear from the manufacturer. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Colon

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: It's very heavy but the table portion is pretty small. Affordable though. The little screws to hold the arm are tightened by alan wrenches and no matter what it keeps coming lose and the table gets wobbly every few days i have to retighten the foot screws.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very professional quality built and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Product as advertised. Fast shipping. Very professional quality built and sturdy! Impressed with the first one I bought decided to buy another! Best value for a grooming table!
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work
customer_reviews.text: Got it today and it dose not work. Motor won’t do a thing
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Works great for small dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this table for a little over a year now grooming about 35 dogs a week. I highly recommend if you are grooming small-medium sized dogs. I've had a few labs and standard poodles get the nervous shakes and the table shakes if I'm not leaning on it. I would give it 5 stars if it didn't shake but I'm overall impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Deyanira Carrasco

customer_reviews.title: Great table for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this table for a month. Key points...very stable, quiet and steady up and down movement. Does not frighten the dogs. My only wish is that it dropped just a bit lower to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: A little slow
customer_reviews.text: Great table just goes up and down a little to slow but is whisper quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table. My wife is a part time groomer and uses this table on the weekends and she loves it . I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: austin floyd

customer_reviews.title: Professional grooming table
customer_reviews.text: It came nearly all the way assembled! Only have to place the bottom support screw in footers and the table harness then It’s ready to go. Perfect size, waterproof, and adjustable for right or left harness. Great table!
customer_reviews.author: Kearsten Caudill

customer_reviews.title: very important we have 5  airedales and  saves me much  in body aches and easier on the dogs
customer_reviews.text: super fast shipping, built very good and strong, works with ease. packaged great for shipping
customer_reviews.author: ann williams

customer_reviews.title: Item Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The electrical box under the table is damaged. It is loose and the box is hot. Delivery service noted in paperwork that box was damaged when delivered. I would like to exchange this item for a table that is safe for my salon. It is too heavy for me to box and reship. Please contact me on how to proceed. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: this table is the best!!
customer_reviews.text: this table is the best!!! I didn't like the way it was boxed because it got dinged but I LOVE my table!!! best investment ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Adri Fonta

customer_reviews.title: Arm not very stable and will the weld will snap off.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this table since February- with no use for over two months due to quarantine and the arm has never been quiet table. Today while working the weld snapped and fell off for the table. One week later the other end snapped off and now my table is unusable. I will never order again.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: 🐩🐕🐶
customer_reviews.text: Professional groomer, table works great just wish the grooming bar was sturdier. When grooming the big jerky guys it bends a bit and is unsettling
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Table works flawlessly. It can get a little wobbly with a big dog on it. But you can’t beat the value of this table
customer_reviews.author: matthew peace

customer_reviews.title: Great Table!
customer_reviews.text: Works well! Can hold a large, 75lb Goldendoodle with no problem. Can most likely hold larger dogs as well. Motor works great. I’ll be getting a pad to put on the table, so help dogs not slide, but otherwise a fantastic table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredibly well made table. Very sturdy and solid. Virtually no wobble at any height. Quiet operation. Excellent buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Tables break quickly
customer_reviews.text: The ends of the table feet don't stay on. The feet have to be adjusted often. The table top wobbles up and down. We have to tighten the bolts weekly. Still on the search for reliable tables.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Nazaretian

customer_reviews.title: Table is nice
customer_reviews.text: I revise my previous review of the table being unstable. We had a couple bolts that were not tight after we tightened them the table seems much better.
customer_reviews.author: julie caird

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: Beginner Groomer , absolutely love my table. I am on the short size , so it adjusting to my size is a big plus. It was shipped and packed very well for delivery. very pleased customer!
customer_reviews.author: crystal zamora

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: works great and is powerful too! I use it in my shop and it does every thing I want it too. Great price for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Joel C. Mobley

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I now have two of these and plan on buying a third. Works great in my professional grooming salon and gets used all day 5 days a week. Has held up very well and fits almost every size dog.
customer_reviews.author: Markie James

customer_reviews.title: Table damaged
customer_reviews.text: My table came damaged the box was all ripped open and missing parts for the grooming arm. would like to know who to contact in regards to this
customer_reviews.author: Lisa hagen

customer_reviews.title: Awesomely Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this table!!! Exactly what I needed/wanted!!! The only thing I wish were different is the up/down pedal... I wish it was reversed... but I love everything else about it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery was sweet.
customer_reviews.text: This was just what i wanted....with 4 dogs this has saved my back....at 68 i needing one touch useage.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth K.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I had nothing but problems with this table and I bought it almost a year ago
customer_reviews.author: s e p

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table for the money! My shop table was twice the cost, larger and all around better however this table is perfect for moderate to light work. I would purchase again. Will add a better grooming arm down the road. Outer packaging was damaged, inner packaging was not harmed nor was the table.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality of workmanship.
customer_reviews.text: Prompt Delivery. Very sturdy packaging. Already put together except for harness attachment. Very pleased with quality. Would highly recommend this product,
customer_reviews.author: morris funk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love the table.groomed 5 of my dogs today ! Table is slanted just adjusted the screw in feet.
customer_reviews.author: helen hughes

customer_reviews.title: Nice but wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Used twice so far. Top is a little wobbly and the arm is not so great. Will try with a new arm and see how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Brittnie

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Works great with our 75 pound Golden doodle. Packaging was good to protect it during shipping. No complaints so far 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product!
customer_reviews.text: Much sturdier than her old table! Was very satisfied with the price!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not that sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I thought it would be and not as sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Wolfgirl

customer_reviews.title: worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and easy to use. The price was shocking at first but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: DoctorScrewLoose

customer_reviews.title: Best groom table for large breeds!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a grooming table for your large pet breed. This is it. Don’t go for those cheaper listing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far it's ok. I am worried that the motor or hydraulic will go out. We'll see if it gets 5 stars a year from now.
customer_reviews.author: P. Schenk

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t think it would hold my big dogs I groom but it does!
customer_reviews.author: marisa brown

customer_reviews.title: I like the smoothness of the electric
customer_reviews.text: Works really well but the arm kind of stinks. It wobbles because its in 2 sections but overall works.
customer_reviews.author: Jenne Lura

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Love this table I have a grooming business and it is great.
customer_reviews.author: KimWilliamson

customer_reviews.title: Nice table, good construction
customer_reviews.text: Nice table, good construction, nice looking... a little wobbly, had a hard time getting to sit level. Grooming arm is crap!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Grooming Table
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grooming table. It is sturdy, easily operable and serves every purpose of our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart R. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my wife needed. It is easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Allen E Lavelle

customer_reviews.title: To understand  measurement
customer_reviews.text: It’s smaller than I thought, I use it for dog grooming
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table, don’t have any problems with the arm, been grooming on a a while
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Maccahery

customer_reviews.title: easily setup.
customer_reviews.text: my wife grooms part time, and just loves this table. Well built, easily setup.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Good quality for the price. Arrived in 5 days and before Christmas as promised!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slightly disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Packaged very well. Very stable with a 40lb. Standard Poodle on the table. Looks to be well made for the price. Cons: Manufacturer didn't offer wheels. I purchased wheels from Tractor Supply. 3" wheels were the smallest/sturdiest I could find. With the wheels, the table only lowers to 25" from the floor. It's difficult for my Std. Poodle to easily jump up on & she's an avid jumper. I'm 57 years young & was really hoping to not have to lift her into a table. Kind of defeats the purpose of an electric table.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of these tables. No issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional groomer and just bought a second one for my home. Love this table!
customer_reviews.author: Deana Beasley

customer_reviews.title: the strap for holding the dog is ribbon material and frays easily. It needed updating also
customer_reviews.text: The table and bar itself were well built, the problem first is the bolts needed to screw it into the table were non existent. I had to go and purchase them from Lowes to assemble. That was cheaper than returning. Also, the strap for holding the dog is ribbon material and frays easily. It needed updating also.
customer_reviews.author: wayne marok

customer_reviews.title: It is ok but wish had peddles on both sides ...
customer_reviews.text: It is ok but wish had peddles on both sides. Rubber on top should go to the edge it is tacked down with medal rim on top. I have been a groomer over 20 years would have sent it back but that would have been too much trouble
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn B.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet when taking the table up and down. Wish it came with wheels.
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: So far so good with this table
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with this table, it was easy to put together and so far working well for me. I groom two days a week from home. It was definitely a two person job to get it out of the box and moved to it's permanent location.
customer_reviews.author: Gwynne Friters

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Platform is a little too high. Other than that product works well.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Solid table
customer_reviews.text: Solid table for the money..Not crazy about the arm but still a great deal
customer_reviews.author: taddfast

customer_reviews.title: I love the table bought one a couple of weeks ago ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the table bought one a couple of weeks ago went to buy another the price jumped 100.00.Guess im not getting a 2nd one:(.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Martins

customer_reviews.title: Just a picture of what it is supposed to look like.
customer_reviews.text: The table works well, I just didn't receive any warranty information. Just a picture of what it is supposed to look like.
customer_reviews.author: PAW

customer_reviews.title: Best value. Well made.
customer_reviews.text: This by far is the best value I found. Well made, sturdy & perfect size. Easy setup. Just took it out of box & started using it. No wobbling & quiet motor.
customer_reviews.author: Diane H

product_meta.title: Go Pet Club Grooming Table, Electric Motor
product_meta.description: The Go Pet Club Electric Z-Lift Grooming Professional Table was designed for professional style grooming, but can fit in both a business and your home! This particular grooming table features a Z-Lift frame with H-Style base, which provides extra stability and prevents the table top from wobbling. The electric motor lifts provides you with easy, smooth height adjustment for convenience and flexibility. The table top features pebbled, non-slip plastic and rubber composite materials, while lined with premium aluminum alloy materials to prevent absorption and warping of the wood underneath. The static free surface allows for easier cleaning and maintenance of your grooming table. All grooming tables come with clamp-on style grooming adjustable arm made of steel and a grooming leash to keep pet in place. This product comes fully assembled.
feature_bullets: Size: 36"W x 23.6"L (Electric motor lifts can adjusts 21.5" - 41.3" H)
Animal type:Dog.The product features a Z-Lift base, providing extra stability and eliminates wobbling and tipping
The product features a Z-Lift base, providing extra stability and eliminates wobbling and tipping; Includes adjustable grooming arm with leash

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
